question.text: A foreign gene is inserted in pBR322 using the restriction endonuclease EcoRI. Which of these is true about the E. coli having this pBR322?

options.text: It will be resistant to both antibiotic ampicillin as well as antibiotic tetracycline
It will be resistant to antibiotic ampicillin but not resistant to antibiotic tetracycline
It will be resistant to antibiotic tetracycline but not resistant to antibiotic ampicillin
It will be neither be resistant to antibiotic tetracycline nor to antibiotic ampicillin

solution.text: The restriction site for EcoRI in pBR322 is not present within the ampicillin-resistant gene or within the tetracycline-resistant gene. Thus, when the foreign DNA is added, there will not be insertional activation of any of these genes and the bacterium will be resistant to both antibiotics.
